GV03sb_08_u:416: retaḥsicorvelayeme vai retaḥsicāvanayostadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmādanayorvāyuḥ sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:417: upadadhāti sarvatastadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvato vāyuḥ sarvataḥ samīcīḥ
GV03sb_08_u:418: sarvatastatsamyañcaṃ vāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samyaṅbhūtvā sarvābhyo digbhyo
GV03sb_08_u:419: vāti diśyā anūpadadhāti dikṣu tadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu vāyuḥ 8.2.3.[3]
GV03sb_08_u:424: pāhyapānam me pāhi vyānam me pāhi cakṣurma urvyā bibhāhi śrotram me
GV03sb_08_u:435: sarvatastadvṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvato varṣati sarvataḥ samīcīḥ sarvatastamīcīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:436: vṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samyaṅbhūtvā sarvābhyo digbhyo varṣati vāyavyā
GV03sb_08_u:437: anūpadadhāti vāyau tadvṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti tasmādyāṃ diśaṃ vāyureti tāṃ diśaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:443: tatprāṇebhyo 'nnaṃ dadhātyapaḥ pinvauṣadhīrjinva dvipādava catuṣpātpāhi divo
GV03sb_08_u:458: tāngāyatrī cando bhūtvā vayasāpnottadyadgāyatryāpnodetaddhi canda āśiṣṭhaṃ sā
GV03sb_08_u:466: prajāpatirvai kṣatraṃ sa vayo 'bhavanmayaṃdaṃ canda iti yadvā
GV03sb_08_u:467: aniruktaṃ tanmayaṃdamanirukto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatireva cando 'bhavat 8.2.3.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:475: ityāpo vai prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī tā hi parame sthāne tiṣṭhanti prajāpatireva
GV03sb_08_u:479: catvāri vayāṃsi catvāri candāṃsi tadaṣṭāvaṣṭākṣarā gāyatryeṣā vai sā
GV03sb_08_u:480: gāyatrī yā tadbhūtvā prajāpatiretānpaśūnvayasāpnottasmājjīrṇam paśuṃ vayasāpta
GV03sb_08_u:481: ityācakṣate tasmādu sarvāsveva vayo vaya ityamuvartate 'tha ye 'smātte paśava
GV03sb_08_u:482: udakrāmannete te pañcadaśottare vajro vai paśavo vajraḥ pañcadaśastasmādyasya
GV03sb_08_u:483: paśavo bhavantyapaiva sa pāpmānaṃ hate vajro haiva tasya pāpmānamapahanti
GV03sb_08_u:484: tasmādyāṃ kāṃ ca diśam paśumāneti vajravihitāṃ haiva tāmanveti 8.2.4.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:486: basto vaya iti bastaṃ vayasāpnodvivalaṃ canda ityekapadā vai vivalaṃ canda ekapadā
GV03sb_08_u:490: vṛṣṇiṃ vayasāpnodviśālaṃ canda iti dvipadā vai viśālaṃ cando dvipadā
GV03sb_08_u:494: puruṣaṃ vayasāpnottandraṃ canda iti paṅktirvai tandraṃ candaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:498: vyāghraṃ vayasāpnodanādhṛṣṭaṃ canda iti virāḍvā anādhṛṣṭaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:499: cando 'nnaṃ vai virāḍannamanādhṛṣṭaṃ virāḍṛ bhūtvā vyāghrā uccakramuḥ 8.2.4.[5]
GV03sb_08_u:502: siṃhaṃ vayasāpnoccadiścanda ityaticandā vai cadiścandaḥ sā hi sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:503: candāṃsi cādayatyaticandā ha bhūtvā siṃhā uccakramurathāto niruktāneva
GV03sb_08_u:507: paṣṭhavāhaṃ vayasāpnodbṛhatī canda iti bṛhatī ha bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:515: ṛṣabhaṃ vayasāpnotsatobṛhatī canda iti satobṛhatī ha bhūtva
GV03sb_08_u:523: dhenuṃ vayasāpnojjagatī canda iti jagatī ha bhūtvā dhenava
GV03sb_08_u:527: tryaviṃ vayasāpnottriṣṭupcanda iti triṣṭubbha bhūtvā tryavaya
GV03sb_08_u:531: dityavāhaṃ vayasāpnodvirāṭ canda iti virāḍa bhūtvā dityavāha
GV03sb_08_u:535: pañcāviṃ vayasāpnodgāyatrī canda iti gāyatrī ha bhūtvā pañcāvaya
GV03sb_08_u:548: 'tha cando vayasā ca hyenāṃścandasā ca parigatyātmannadhattātmannakuruta
GV03sb_08_u:549: tathaivainānayametadvayasā caiva candasā ca parigatyātmandhatta ātmankurute 8.2.4.[17]
GV03sb_08_u:553: purastādupadadhāti śiro 'sya tā atha yā dakṣiṇataścottarataśca sa ātmātha yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:558: dakṣiṇata upadhāyottarata upadadhāti sārdhamayamātmā jāyātā ityatha paścātpucaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:563: madhyaṃ tatprati paśuṃ variṣṭhaṃ karoti tasmānmadhyam prati paśurvariṣṭho 'tha
GV03sb_08_u:564: ye vīryavattamāḥ paśavastāndakṣiṇata upadadhāti dakṣiṇaṃ tadardham
GV03sb_08_u:569: atha yadiha hrasiṣṭhānpaśūnupadadhāti teno etā aṇiṣṭhāḥ pūrvārdhaṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:570: tajjaghanārdhaṃ ca paśoraṇiṣṭhau karoti tasmātpūrvārdhaśca jaghanārdhaśca
GV03sb_08_u:571: paśoraṇiṣṭhau tasmātpūrvārdhena ca jaghanārdhena ca paśurucca tiṣṭhati saṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:572: viśatyatha lokampṛṇe upadadhātyasyāṃ sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:576: etadvai devā dvitīyāṃ citiṃ citvā samārohanyadūrdhvam
GV03sb_08_u:579: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:580: cetayamānā antarikṣameva bṛhatīṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyaṃstebhya eṣa loko 'candayat 8.3.1.[3]
GV03sb_08_u:583: yuvaṃ na imāṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimupadhattamiti kiṃ nau tato
GV03sb_08_u:584: bhaviṣyatīti yuvameva naḥ śreṣṭhau bhaviṣyatha iti tatheti tebhya etāmindrāgnī
GV03sb_08_u:585: tṛtīyāṃ citimupādhattāṃ tasmādāhurindrāgnī eva devānāṃ śreṣṭhāviti 8.3.1.[4]
GV03sb_08_u:593: ādāya vyudakrāmaṃstasyendrāgnī ca viśvakarmā ca madhyamādāyotkamyātiṣṭhan 8.3.1.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:596: upa meta prati ma etaddhatta yena me yūyamudakramiṣṭeti kiṃ nastato
GV03sb_08_u:597: bhaviṣyatīti yuṣmaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:605: iṣṭakāṃ dṛṃhataṃ yuvamiti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_08_u:606: pṛṣṭhena dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ ca vibādhasa iti pṛṣṭhena hyeṣā dyāvāpṛthivī
GV03sb_08_u:616: vyānāyodānāyeti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā sarvasmā u vā
GV03sb_08_u:617: etasmai prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāyetīme vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā ima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:619: mahatyā svastyetyetaccardiṣā śaṃtameneti yaccardiḥ śaṃtamaṃ tenetyetatsādayitvā
GV03sb_08_u:620: sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuratha sāma gāyati tasyopari bandhuḥ 8.3.1.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:623: diśo vai diśyā diśa evaitadupadadhāti tadyābhirado
GV03sb_08_u:624: vāyurdigbhiranantarhitābhirupaittā etāstā evaitadupadadhāti tā u evāmūḥ
GV03sb_08_u:625: purastāddarbhastambaṃ ca logeṣṭakāścopadadhātyasau vā āditya etā amuṃ tadādityaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:626: dikṣvadhyūhati dikṣu cinoti tā yattatraiva syurbahirdhā tatsyurbahirdho vā
GV03sb_08_u:627: etadyoneragnikarma yatpurā puṣkaraparṇāttā yadihāhṛtyopadadhāti tadenā yonau
GV03sb_08_u:628: puṣkaraparṇe pratiṣṭhāpayati tatho haitā abahirdhā bhavanti tā anantarhitāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:631: dadhāti retaḥsicorvelayeme vai retaḥsicāvanayostaddiśo dadhāti tasmādanayordiśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:632: sarvata upadadhāti sarvatastaddiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvato diśaḥ samīcīḥ
GV03sb_08_u:636: candāṃsi vai diśo gāyatrī vai prācī diktraṣṭubdakṣiṇā
GV03sb_08_u:637: jagatī pratīcyanuṣṭubudīcī paṅktirūrdhvā paśavo vai candāṃsyantarikṣam
GV03sb_08_u:641: candāṃsi vai diśaḥ paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:642: madhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadannaṃ dadhāti tā anantarhitāḥ svayamātṛṇāyā
GV03sb_08_u:643: upadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānantarhitaṃ tatprāṇādannaṃ dadhātyuttarā uttaraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:644: tatprāṇādannaṃ dadhāti retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo
GV03sb_08_u:645: madhyata evāsminnetadannaṃ dadhāti sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evāsminnatadannaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:650: digadhipatnyasi bṛhatī digiti nāmānyāsāmetāni nāmagrāhamevainā etadupadadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:651: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hi diśaḥ 8.3.2.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:656: tāmanantarhitāṃ diśyābhya upadadhāti dikṣu tadvāyuṃ dadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu
GV03sb_08_u:660: prajā vai viśvajyotiḥ prajā hyeva viśvaṃ jyotiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:661: prajananamevaitadupadadhāti tāmanantarhitāṃ diśyābhyā upadadhāti dikṣu tatprajā
GV03sb_08_u:669: vyānāyeti prāṇo vai viśvajyotiḥ sarvasmā u vā etasmai
GV03sb_08_u:671: viśvaṃ jyotiryaceti sarvaṃ jyotiryacetyetadvāyuṣṭe 'dhipatiriti vāyumavāsyā adhipatiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:676: nabhasyaśca vārṣikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti dve
GV03sb_08_u:677: iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ
GV03sb_08_u:681: athottare / iṣaścorjaśca śāradāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine
GV03sb_08_u:682: etadupadadhāti dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ
GV03sb_08_u:687: tadyadetā / atropadadhāti saṃvatsara eṣo 'gnirima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:694: madhyameva madhyamā citirmadhyamasya varṣāśaradāvṛtū tadyadetā atropadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:697: tā vā etāḥ / catasra ṛtavyā madhyamāyāṃ citā upadadhāti dve-dve itarāsu citiṣu
GV03sb_08_u:698: catuṣpādā vai paśavo 'ntarikṣam madhyamā citirantarikṣe tatpaśūndadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:701: yadveva catasraḥ catuṣpādā vai paśavo 'nnam paśavo madhyam madhyamā
GV03sb_08_u:709: paśureṣa yadagnirmadhyaṃ tatprati paśuṃ variṣṭhaṃ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:712: tā vā etāḥ / catasra ṛtavyāstāsāṃ viśvajyotiḥ pañcamī pañca diśyāstaddaśa daśākṣarā
GV03sb_08_u:713: virāḍannaṃ virāṇmadhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadannaṃ dadhāti tā
GV03sb_08_u:714: anantarhitāḥ svayamātṛṇāyā upadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānantarhitaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:718: prāṇā vai prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇānevaitadupadadhāti tā daśa
GV03sb_08_u:719: bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ pūrvārdha upadadhāti purastāddhīme prāṇā āyurme pāhi
GV03sb_08_u:720: jyotirme yaceti prāṇo vai jyotiḥ prāṇam me yacetyevaitadāha tā anantarhitā ṛtavyābhya
GV03sb_08_u:721: upadadhāti prāṇo vai vāyurṛtuṣu tadvāyum pratiṣṭhāpayati 8.3.3.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:736: dvādaśākṣarā vai jagatī paśavo vai jagatyannam paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:737: madhyam madhyamā citirmadhyatastadanna dadhāti tā anantarhitāḥ prāṇabhṛdbhya
GV03sb_08_u:742: ayaṃ vai loko māyaṃ hi loko mita iva pramā canda ityantarikṣaloko
GV03sb_08_u:743: vai pramāntarikṣaloko hyasmāllokātpramita iva pratimā canda ityasau vai lokaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:745: lokeṣvannaṃ tadasrīvayo 'tho yadebhyo lokebhyo 'nnaṃ sravati tadasrīvayo 'thāto
GV03sb_08_u:749: uṣṇikcando bṛhatī cando 'nuṣṭupcando virāṭ cando gāyatrī
GV03sb_08_u:750: candastriṣṭupcando jagatī canda ityetāni niruktāni virāḍaṣṭamāni
GV03sb_08_u:751: candāṃsyupadadhāti pṛthivī cando 'ntarikṣaṃ canda iti yānyetaddevatyāni candāṃsi
GV03sb_08_u:759: niruktāni cāniruktāni copadadhāti tasmānniruktamannamadyamānaṃ na kṣīyate 8.3.3.[8]
GV03sb_08_u:763: vai sā bṛhatī yāṃ taddevā antarikṣam bṛhatīṃ tṛtīyāṃ citimapaśyaṃstasyā etasyai devā
GV03sb_08_u:772: bhūtāni vyudakrāmannetāstā iṣṭakāstadyadetā upadadhāti yānyevāsmāttāni bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:777: virāḍannaṃ virāḍannamu candramā atha yā uttarāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadardhamāsāśca te
GV03sb_08_u:778: māsāśca caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsāścandramā vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:788: yadvālakhilyā nāma yadvā urvarayorasambhinnam bhavati khila iti vai tadācakṣate
GV03sb_08_u:801: śiro grīvā yadūrdhvaṃ nābhestatsaptamamaṅge 'ṅge hi prāṇa ete vai sapta
GV03sb_08_u:805: sapta vā ime paścātprāṇāścatvāryūrvaṣṭhīvāni dvai pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:806: yadavāṅnābhestatsaptamamaṅge 'ṅge hi prāṇa ete vai sapta
GV03sb_08_u:810: dhruvāsi dharuṇā dhartryasi dharaṇī yantrī rāḍyantryasi yamanī
GV03sb_08_u:820: dharaṇītyamuṃ dharaṇītyamuṃ lokamāyuṣe tvā varcase tvā kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya
GV03sb_08_u:826: iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā te devā imām
GV03sb_08_u:831: dharitrītīmaṃ lokamiṣe tvorje tvā rayyai tvā poṣāya tveti catvāraścatuṣpādāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:838: 'nuvākastadantarikṣaṃ sa ātmā tadyattā ekādaśa bhavantyekādaśākṣarā vai
GV03sb_08_u:839: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubhamantarikṣamatha yā uttarāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ sa vāyuḥ sa prajāpatiḥ so 'gniḥ
GV03sb_08_u:843: śiro 'sya tāstā daśa bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ prāṇā u vai
GV03sb_08_u:847: yadūrdhvam madhyādavācīnaṃ śīrṣṇastadasya tā atha yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:848: paścādyadūrdhvam pratiṣṭhāyā avācīnam madhyāttadasya tāḥ pratiṣṭhaivottarataḥ 8.3.4.[14]
GV03sb_08_u:858: sa eṣa vāyuḥ prajāpatirasmiṃstraiṣṭubhe 'ntarikṣe samantam paryaknastadyattṛtīyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:859: citimupadadhāti vāyuṃ caiva tadantarikṣaṃ ca saṃkkṛtyopadhatte 'tha lokampṛṇe
GV03sb_08_u:860: upadadhātyasyāṃ sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ nivapati tasyopari bandhuḥ 8.4.1.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:866: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:871: tvāmihopadadhāmahā iti kim me tato bhaviṣyatīti tvameva naḥ
GV03sb_08_u:872: śreṣṭham bhaviṣyasīti tatheti te 'tra brahmopādadhata tasmādāhurbrahmaiva
GV03sb_08_u:873: devānāṃ śreṣṭhamiti tadetayā vai caturthyā cityeme dyāvāpṛthivī viṣṭabdhe brahma
GV03sb_08_u:874: vai caturthī citistasmādāhurbrahmaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī viṣṭabdhe iti stomānupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:875: prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇā u vai brahma brahmaivaitadupadadhāti 8.4.1.[4]
GV03sb_08_u:879: iti tatheti sa vai nābravītkim me tato bhaviṣyatīti yadu ha kiṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:881: putreṣvicate kimasmākaṃ tato bhaviṣyatītyevāhuratha yatputrāḥ pitari
GV03sb_08_u:882: tathetyevāhaivaṃ hi tadagre prajāpatiśca devāśca samavadanta stomānupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:883: prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇā u vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatimevaitadupadadhāti 8.4.1.[5]
GV03sb_08_u:886: ye vai te prāṇā ṛṣaya etāṃ caturthīṃ citimapaśyanye ta
GV03sb_08_u:887: etena rasenopāyaṃsta ete tānevaitadupadadhāti stomānupadadhāti prāṇā vai stomāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:896: upa mehi prati ma etaddhehi yena me tvamudakramīriti kim me tato
GV03sb_08_u:897: bhaviṣyatīti tvaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:903: stomānupadadhāti prāṇā vai stomāḥ prāṇāu vai vāyurvāyumevaitadupadadhāti 8.4.1.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:907: tadyattamāhāśurityeṣa hi stomānāmāśiṣṭho 'tho vāyurvā āśustrivṛtsa eṣu triṣu
GV03sb_08_u:908: lokeṣu vartate tadyattamāhāśurityeṣa hi sarveṣām bhūtānāmāśiṣṭho vāyurha bhūtvā
GV03sb_08_u:912: ya eva pañcadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:913: bhānta iti vajro vai bhānto vajraḥ pañcadaśo 'tho candramā vai bhāntaḥ pañcadaśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:914: sa ca pañcadaśāhānyāpūryate pañcadaśāpakṣīyate tadyattamāha bhānta iti bhāti hi
GV03sb_08_u:915: candramāścandramā ha bhūtvā dakṣiṇatastasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti 8.4.1.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:918: ya eva saptadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:919: vyometi prajāpatirvai vyomā prajāpatiḥ saptadaśo 'tho saṃvatsaro vāva vyomā
GV03sb_08_u:920: saptadaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastadyattamāha vyometi vyomā hi
GV03sb_08_u:921: saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro ha bhūtvottaratastasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti 8.4.1.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:924: ya evaikaviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:925: iti pratiṣṭhā vai dharuṇaḥ pratiṣṭhaikaviṃśo 'tho asau vā ādityo dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:926: ekaviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastraya ime lokā asāvevādityo dharuṇa
GV03sb_08_u:927: ekaviṃśastadyattamāha dharuṇa iti yadā hyevaiṣo 'stametyathedaṃ sarvaṃ dhriyata
GV03sb_08_u:928: ādityo ha bhūtvā paścāttasthau tadeva tadrūpamupadadhātyatha
GV03sb_08_u:932: ya evāṣṭādaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:933: pratūrtiraṣṭādaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva
GV03sb_08_u:934: pratūrtiraṣṭādaśastadyattamāha pratūrtiriti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni pratirati
GV03sb_08_u:938: ya eva navadaśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro tapo
GV03sb_08_u:939: navadaśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsara eva tapo navadaśastadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:940: tapa iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni tapati tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti 8.4.1.[15]
GV03sb_08_u:943: ya eva saviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vā
GV03sb_08_u:944: abhīvartaḥ saviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara evābhīvartaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:945: saviṃśastadyattamāhābhīvarta iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtānyabhivartate tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:949: ya eva dvāviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:950: varco dvāviṃśastasya dvādaśa māsāḥ sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva varco
GV03sb_08_u:951: dvāviṃśastadyattamāha varca iti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām bhūtānāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:954: sambharaṇastrayoviṃśa iti ya eva trayoviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:955: vāva sambharaṇastrayoviṃsastasya trayodaśa māsā sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara
GV03sb_08_u:956: eva sambharaṇastrayoviṃśastadyattamāha sambharaṇa iti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:960: ya eva caturviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:965: ya eva pañcaviṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:966: vāva garbhāḥ pañcaviṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ saṃvatsara eva garbhāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:967: pañcaviṃśastadyattamāha garbhā iti saṃvatsaro ha trayodaśo māso garbho bhūtva
GV03sb_08_u:971: ya eva triṇava stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāhauja iti v/jro vā
GV03sb_08_u:972: ojo vajrastriṇavo 'tho saṃvatsaro vā ojastriṇavastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dve
GV03sb_08_u:973: ahorātre saṃvatsara evaujastriṇavastadyattamāhauja iti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām
GV03sb_08_u:977: ya evaikatriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:979: kraturekatriṃśastadyattamāha kraturiti saṃvatsaro hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni karoti tadeva
GV03sb_08_u:983: ya eva trayastriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:984: pratiṣṭheti pratiṣṭhā hi trayastriṃśo 'tho saṃvatsaro vāva pratiṣṭhā trayastriṃśastasya
GV03sb_08_u:985: caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ ṣadṛtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:986: trayastriṃśastadyattamāha pratiṣṭheti saṃvatsaro hi sarveṣām bhūtānām pratiṣṭhā
GV03sb_08_u:991: saṃvatsaro vāva bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsāḥ sapta
GV03sb_08_u:992: 'rtavo dve ahorātre saṃvatsara eva bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśastadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:993: bradhnasya viṣṭapamiti svārājyaṃ vai bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ svārājya
GV03sb_08_u:997: ya eva ṣaṭtriṃśa stomastaṃ tadupadadhātyatho saṃvatsaro vāva
GV03sb_08_u:998: nākaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśastasya caturviṃśatirardhamāsā dvādaśa māsāstadyattamāha nāka iti na
GV03sb_08_u:999: hi tatra gatāya kasmai canākam bhavatyatho saṃvatsaro vāva nākaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1005: sapta 'rtavo dve ahorātre tadyattamāha vivarta iti saṃvatsarāddhi sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:1009: ya eva catuṣṭoma stomastaṃ tadupadadhāti tadyattamāha
GV03sb_08_u:1010: dhartramiti pratiṣṭhā vai dhartram pratiṣṭhā catuṣṭomo 'tho vāyurvāva dhartraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1011: catuṣṭomaḥ sa ābhiścatasṛbhirdigbhi stute tadyattamāha dhartramiti pratiṣṭhā vai
GV03sb_08_u:1012: dhartraṃ vāyuru sarveṣām bhūtānām pratiṣṭhā tadeva tadrūpamupadadhāti sa vai
GV03sb_08_u:1013: vāyumeva prathamamupadadhāti vāyumuttamaṃ vāyunaiva tadetāni sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:1016: tā vā etāḥ / aṣṭādaśeṣṭakā upadadhāti tau dvau trivṛtau prāṇo vai trivṛdvāyuru prāṇo
GV03sb_08_u:1020: aṣṭādaśo vai saṃvatsaro dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsara
GV03sb_08_u:1026: garbhyabhavattānyasya garbha eva santi pāpmā mṛtyuragṛhṇāt 8.4.2.[2]
GV03sb_08_u:1029: yuṣmābhiḥ sahemāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇavānīti
GV03sb_08_u:1030: kiṃ nastato bhaviṣyatīti vṛṇīdhvamityabravīttam bhāgo no 'stvityeke
GV03sb_08_u:1033: bhāgamekebhyaḥ kṛtvādhipatyamekebhyaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇoti
GV03sb_08_u:1037: dīkṣāyā ādhipatyamiti vāgvai dīkṣāgnaye bhāgaṃ kṛtvā vāca
GV03sb_08_u:1038: ādhipatyamakarodbrahma spṛtaṃ trivṛtstoma iti brahma prajānāṃ trivṛtā stomena
GV03sb_08_u:1043: ādhipatyamakarotkṣatraṃ spṛtam pañcadaśa stoma iti kṣatram prajānām
GV03sb_08_u:1047: dhāturādhipatyamiti devā vai nṛcakṣaso devebhyo bhāgaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1048: kṛtvā dhātra ādhipatyamakarojjanitraṃ spṛtaṃ saptadaśa stoma iti viḍvai janitraṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1049: viśam prajānāṃ saptadaśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot 8.4.2.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:1052: varuṇasyādhipatyamiti prāṇo vai mitro 'pāno varuṇaḥ prāṇāya
GV03sb_08_u:1053: bhāgaṃ kṛtvāpānāyādhipatyamakaroddivo vṛṣṭirvāta spṛta ekaviṃśa stoma iti vṛṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1054: ca vātaṃ ca prajānāmekaviṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot 8.4.2.[7]
GV03sb_08_u:1057: rudrāṇāmādhipatyamiti prāṇo vai mitro 'pāno varuṇaḥ prāṇāya
GV03sb_08_u:1058: bhāgaṃ kṛtvāpānāyādhipatyamakaroddivo vṛṣṭirvāta spṛta ekaviṃśa stoma iti vṛṣṭiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1059: ca vātaṃ ca prajānāmekaviṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇot 8.4.2.[8]
GV03sb_08_u:1063: ādhipatyamakarodgarbhā spṛtāḥ pañcaviṃśa stoma iti garbhānprajānām pañcaviṃśena
GV03sb_08_u:1067: pūṣṇaṃ ādhipatyamitīyaṃ vā aditirasyai bhāgaṃ kṛtvā pūṣṇa
GV03sb_08_u:1068: ādhipatyamakarodoja spṛtaṃ triṇava stoma ityojaḥ prajānāṃ triṇavena stomena
GV03sb_08_u:1073: bṛhaspataya ādhipatyamakarotsamīcīrdiśa spṛtāścatuṣṭoma stoma iti sarvā diśaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1078: ayavāste hīdaṃ sarvaṃ yuvate cāyuvate ca pūrvapakṣebhyo bhāgaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1079: kṛtvāparapakṣebhya ādhipatyamakarotprajā spṛtāścatuścatvāriṃśa stoma iti sarvāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1084: viśvebhyo devebhya ādhipatyamakarodbhūtaṃ spṛtaṃ trayastriṃśa stoma iti sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:1085: bhūtāni trayastriṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyoraspṛṇottathaivaitadyajamānaḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_08_u:1086: bhūtāni trayastriṃśena stomena pāpmano mṛtyo spṛṇoti 8.4.2.[13]
GV03sb_08_u:1090: prāṇāḥ prāṇā agniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataiva tadetāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni
GV03sb_08_u:1095: sahasyaśca haimantikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1096: dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ karoti 8.4.2.[15]
GV03sb_08_u:1106: yadūrdhvam madhyādavācīnaṃ śīrṣṇastadasyaiṣā caturthī citistadvasya hemanta
GV03sb_08_u:1115: yuṣmābhiḥ sahemāḥ prajāḥ prajanayānīti te vai kena stoṣyāmaha
GV03sb_08_u:1116: iti mayā caiva yuṣmābhiśceti tatheti te prāṇaiścaiva prajāpatinā cāstuvata yadu ha kiṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1117: ca devāḥ kurvate stomenaiva tatkurvate yajño vai stomo yajñenaiva tatkurvate
GV03sb_08_u:1121: vāgvā ekā vācaiva tadastuvata prajā adhīyanteti prajā atrādhīyanta
GV03sb_08_u:1125: trayo vai prāṇāḥ prāṇa udāno vyānastaireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:1135: ya eveme sapta śīrṣanprāṇāstaireva tadastuvata sapta ṛṣayo
GV03sb_08_u:1139: nava vai prāṇāḥ sapta śīrṣannavāñcau dvau taireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:1147: daśa prāṇā dve pratiṣṭhe ātmā trayodaśastenaiva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:1148: māsā asṛjyanteti māsā atrāsṛjyanta saṃvatsaro 'dhipatirāsīditi saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:1158: yadavāṅnābhestatsaptadaśaṃ tenaiva tadastuvata grāmyāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanteti grāmyāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1162: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo nava prāṇāstaireva tadastuvata
GV03sb_08_u:1167: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā ātmaikaviṃśastenaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1172: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā dve pratiṣṭhe ātmā
GV03sb_08_u:1173: trayoviṃśastenaiva tadastuvata kṣudrāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanteti kṣudrāḥ paśavo
GV03sb_08_u:1182: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyāścatvāryaṅgāni dve pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:1183: ātmā saptaviṃśastenaiva tadastuvata dyāvāpṛthivī vyaitāmiti dyāvāpṛthivī atra vyaitāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1184: vasavo rudrā ādityā anuvyāyanniti vasavo rudrā ādityā atrānuvyāyaṃsta evādhipataya
GV03sb_08_u:1188: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā nava prāṇāstaireva
GV03sb_08_u:1193: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇā
GV03sb_08_u:1194: ātmaikatriṃśastenaiva tadastuvata prajā asṛjyanteti prajā atrāsṛjyanta
GV03sb_08_u:1198: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā daśa prāṇā dve pratiṣṭhe
GV03sb_08_u:1203: tā vā etāḥ / saptadaśeṣṭakā upadadhāti saptadaśo vai saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1204: prajanayitā tadetena vai saptadaśena saṃvatsareṇa prajāpatinā prajanayitraitāḥ prajāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1207: prajāpatinā prajanayitraitāḥ prajāḥ prajanayati tāḥ sṛṣṭvātmanprapādayate
GV03sb_08_u:1208: retaḥsicorvelayā pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata evāsminnetāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1209: prajāḥ prapādayati sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evāsminnetāḥ prajāḥ prapādayati 8.4.4.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:1217: mṛtyurasīdadimāmata upadhāsyate tamatra grahīṣyāmīti tam prāpaśyattam
GV03sb_08_u:1226: pañcadaśavatyāṃ saptadaśavatīṃ saptadaśavatyām pañcadaśavatīṃ tā yadevaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1227: vyatihāramupadadhāti tasmādakṣṇayāstomīyā atho yadete stomā ato 'nyathānupūrvaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1228: tasmādvevākṣṇayāstomīyā atho evaṃ devā upādadhatetarathāsurāstato devā
GV03sb_08_u:1229: abhavanparāsurā bhavatyātmanā parāsya dviṣanbhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda 8.4.4.[4]
GV03sb_08_u:1232: so 'traiva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃskṛtastasya trivṛdvatyāveva śiraste
GV03sb_08_u:1233: yattrivṛdvatyau bhavatastrivṛddhi śiro dve bhavato dvikapālaṃ hi śiraḥ pūrvārdha
GV03sb_08_u:1237: te yadekaviṃśavatyau bhavataḥ pratiṣṭhā hyekaviṃśo dve
GV03sb_08_u:1238: bhavato dvandvaṃ hi pratiṣṭhā paścādupadadhāti paścāddhīyam pratiṣṭhā 8.4.4.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:1241: te yatpañcadaśavatyau bhavataḥ pañcadaśau hi bāhū dve
GV03sb_08_u:1242: bhavato dvau hīmau bāhū pārśvata upadadhāti pārśvato hīmau bāhū 8.4.4.[7]
GV03sb_08_u:1245: te yatsaptadaśavatyau bhavataḥ saptadaśaṃ hyannaṃ dve
GV03sb_08_u:1252: sa ātmā tā retaḥsicorvelayopadadhāti pṛṣṭayo vai
GV03sb_08_u:1253: retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyato hyayamātmā sarvata upadadhāti sarvato
GV03sb_08_u:1254: hyayamātmātha yadato 'nyadatiriktaṃ tadyadvai devānāmatiriktaṃ candāṃsi tāni
GV03sb_08_u:1255: tadyāni tāni candāṃsi paśavaste tadye te paśavaḥ puṇyāstā lakṣmyastadyāstāḥ puṇyā
GV03sb_08_u:1256: lakṣmyo 'sau sa ādityaḥ sa āsāmeṣa dakṣiṇataḥ 8.4.4.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:1260: te hanū yāḥ ṣaṭ sā jihveti na tathā kuryādati te recayanti yathā pūrvayorhanvorapare
GV03sb_08_u:1265: asau vā āditya etā amuṃ tadādityametasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1266: diśi dadhma iti na tathā kuryādanyāni vāva tāni karmāṇi yairetamatra dadhāti 8.4.4.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:1270: tasmādyasya dakṣiṇato lakṣma bhavati tam puṇyalakṣmīka ityācakṣata uttarata
GV03sb_08_u:1271: striyā uttarataāyatanā hi strī tattatkṛtameva purastāttvevainā upadadhyādyatrāhaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1272: śirastadeva hanū tajjihvāthaitāḥ puṇyā lakṣmīrmukhato dhatte tasmādyasya mukhe
GV03sb_08_u:1282: sraktyāṃ tayorupari bandhuḥ purīṣaṃ nivapati tasyopari bandhuḥ 8.5.1.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:1288: te 'bruvan / cetayadhvamiti citimicateti vāva tadabruvannita ūrdhvamicateti te
GV03sb_08_u:1289: cetayamānā divameva virājam pañcamīṃ citimapaśyaṃstebhya eṣa loko 'candayat 8.5.1.[3]
GV03sb_08_u:1293: tajjānīta yathemaṃ lokamasapatnamanupabādhaṃ karavāmahā iti te
GV03sb_08_u:1302: sarvata evaitadetaṃ lokamasapatnamanupabādhaṃ kurute parārdha upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1306: eṣā vai sā virāḍyāṃ taddevā virājam pañcamīṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1307: citimapaśyaṃstā daśa-daśopadadhāti daśākṣarā virāḍvirāḍeṣā civiḥ sarvata
GV03sb_08_u:1308: upadadhāti yo vā ekasyāṃ diśi virājati na vai sa virājati yo vāva sarvāsu dikṣu virājati
GV03sb_08_u:1313: sarvataḥ pāpmopāyatata sa etā iṣṭakā apaśyadasapatnāstā upādhatta tābhistam
GV03sb_08_u:1314: pāpmānamapāhata pāpmā vai sapatnastadyadetābhiḥ pāpmānaṃ sapatnamapāhata
GV03sb_08_u:1318: yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nvimaṃ sa pāpmā nopayatate
GV03sb_08_u:1319: yattvetatkaroti yaddevā akurvaṃstatkaravāṇītyatho ya eva pāpmā yaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1321: asapatnāḥ sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evaitatpāpmānaṃ sapatnamapahate parārdha
GV03sb_08_u:1325: agne jātānpraṇudā naḥ sapatnāniti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_08_u:1326: bandhuratha paścātsahasā jātānpraṇudā naḥ sapatnāniti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 8.5.1.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:1335: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubhamantarikṣaṃ catasro diśa eṣa eva vajraḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1336: pañcadaśastasyāsāvevādityaḥ ṣoḍaśī vajrasya bhartā sa etena pañcadaśena
GV03sb_08_u:1337: vajreṇaitayā triṣṭubhā dakṣiṇataḥ pāpmānamapāhata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena
GV03sb_08_u:1341: catuścatvāriṃśa stomo varco draviṇamiti catuścatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai
GV03sb_08_u:1342: triṣṭuptraiṣṭubho vajraḥ sa etena catuścatvāriṃśena vajreṇaitayā triṣṭubhottarataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1347: agneḥ purīṣamasīti brahma vai caturthī citiragniru vai brahma tasyā
GV03sb_08_u:1353: dakṣiṇataudyāmo hi vajro 'ntareṇa dakṣiṇāṃ diśyāmudyāmāya ha tamavakāśaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1362: tau bāhū sa yo 'syābhitaḥ pāpmāsīdbāhubhyāṃ tamapāhata
GV03sb_08_u:1363: tathaivaitadyajamāno yo 'syābhitaḥ pāpmā bhavati bāhubhyāmeva tamapahate 8.5.1.[16]
GV03sb_08_u:1371: yadapāniti tena taṃ yaḥ paścādatha yadbāhubhyāṃ karma kurute tena taṃ yo 'bhito
GV03sb_08_u:1372: 'tha yadannamatti tena taṃ ya upariṣṭātsarvadā ha vā evaṃvitpāpmānamapahate 'pi
GV03sb_08_u:1373: svapaṃstasmādevaṃ viduṣaḥ pāpaṃ na kīrtayennedasya pāpmāsānīti 8.5.2.[1]
GV03sb_08_u:1379: prāyacannetāścandasyāḥ paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśavastānyasmā acadayaṃstāni
GV03sb_08_u:1388: ayaṃ vai loka evaścando varivaścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai varivaścandaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1389: śambhūścanda iti dyaurvai śambhūścandaḥ paribhūścanda iti diśo vai paribhūścanda
GV03sb_08_u:1390: ācaccanda ityannaṃ vā ācaccando manaścanda iti p rajāpatirvai manaścando
GV03sb_08_u:1394: prāṇo vai sindhuścandaḥ samudraścanda iti mano vai
GV03sb_08_u:1395: samudraścandaḥ sariraṃ canda iti vāgvai sariraṃ candaḥ kakupcanda iti prāṇo vai
GV03sb_08_u:1396: kakupcandastrikakupcanda ityudāno vai trikakupcandaḥ kāvyaṃ canda iti trayī vai
GV03sb_08_u:1397: vidyā kāvyaṃ cando 'ṅkupaṃ canda ityāpo vā aṅkupaṃ cando 'kṣarapaṅktiścanda
GV03sb_08_u:1398: ityasau vai loko 'kṣarapaṅktiścandaḥ padapaṅktiścanda ityayaṃ vai lokaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1399: padapaṅktiścando viṣṭārapaṅktiścanda iti diśo vai viṣṭārapaṅktiścandaḥ kṣuro
GV03sb_08_u:1400: bhrajaścanda ityasau vā ādityaḥ kṣuro bhrajaścanda ācaccandaḥ pracaccanda
GV03sb_08_u:1404: rātrirvai saṃyaccando viyaccanda ityaharvai viyaccando bṛhaccanda
GV03sb_08_u:1405: ityasau vai loko bṛhaccando rathantaraṃ canda ityayaṃ vai loko rathantaraṃ cando
GV03sb_08_u:1406: nikāyaścanda iti vāyurvai nikāyaścando vivadhaścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:1407: vivadhaścando giraścanda ityannaṃ vai giraścando bhrajaścanda ityagnirvai
GV03sb_08_u:1409: vāganuṣṭupcanda evas=cando varivaścanda iti tasyokto bandhuḥ 8.5.2.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:1412: annaṃ vai vayaścando vayaskṛccanda ityagnirvai vayaskṛccando
GV03sb_08_u:1413: viṣpardhāścanda ityasau vai loko viṣpardhāścando viśālaṃ canda ityayaṃ vai loko
GV03sb_08_u:1414: viśālaṃ candaścadiścanda ityantarikṣaṃ vai cadiścando dūrohaṇaṃ canda ityasau vā
GV03sb_08_u:1415: ādityo dūrohaṇaṃ candastandraṃ canda iti paṅktirvai tandraṃ cando 'ṅkāṅkaṃ canda
GV03sb_08_u:1420: dvitīyodānastṛtīyodānaścaturthī vyānaḥ pañcamī prāṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhī prāṇaḥ saptamī
GV03sb_08_u:1421: vyāno 'ṣṭamyudāno navamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ

GV03sb_08_u:1428: daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ virājyadhūḍhaḥ pratiṣṭhito devatāmayyāmarvācīśca
GV03sb_08_u:1434: saptamyantarikṣamaṣṭamī dyaurnavamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna
GV03sb_08_u:1440: hemantaścaturthī varṣāḥ pañcamī grīṣmaḥ ṣaṣṭhī grīṣmaḥ saptamī varṣā
GV03sb_08_u:1441: aṣṭamī hemanto navamī yajamāna evātra daśamī sa eṣa yajamāna etasyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1442: virājyadhyūḍhaḥ pratiṣṭhita ṛtumayyāmarvācīśca parācīścopadadhāti tasmādeta ṛtavo
GV03sb_08_u:1446: yāḥ purastādupadadhāti prāṇāste tā daśa bhavanti daśa vai prāṇāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1450: etāstā devatā agniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca
GV03sb_08_u:1457: māsāste vāsantikau dvau graiṣmau dvau vārṣikau dvau śāradau
GV03sb_08_u:1461: yā prathamā daśadayaṃ sa loko yā dvitīyāntarikṣaṃ tadyā tṛtīyā
GV03sb_08_u:1462: dyauḥ semameva lokam prathamayā daśatārohannantarikṣaṃ dvitīyayā divaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1463: tṛtīyayā tathaivaitadyajamāna imameva lokam prathamayā daśatā rohatyantarikṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1467: iyamu vai pratiṣṭhā te devā imām
GV03sb_08_u:1469: yottamā daśadayaṃ sa lokastasmādyathaiva prathamāyai daśataḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1478: 'smādudacikramiṣattamabravītkathotkrāmasi kathā mā jahāsīti sa vai me 'syānnasya
GV03sb_08_u:1479: rasam prayaceti tena vai mā saha prapadyasveti tatheti tasmā etasyānnasya rasam
GV03sb_08_u:1484: atha yaḥ so 'nnasya rasa etāstā stomabhāgā atha yaḥ sa indro 'sau sa ādityaḥ sa eṣa
GV03sb_08_u:1485: eva stomo yaddhi kiṃ ca stuvata etameva tena stuvanti tasmā etasmai stomāyaitam
GV03sb_08_u:1489: eṣa vai raśmirannaṃ raśmiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca
GV03sb_08_u:1490: saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate pretinā dharmaṇā dharmaṃ jinvetyeṣa vai pretirannam
GV03sb_08_u:1491: pretiretaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃdhāyātmanprapādayate 'nvityā divā divaṃ jinvetyeṣa vā

GV03sb_08_u:1503: ayaṃ sa loko yā dvitīyā antarikṣaṃ tadyāstṛtīyā dyauḥ sā
GV03sb_08_u:1504: yāścaturthyaḥ prācī sā digyāḥ pañcamyo dakṣiṇā sā yāḥ ṣaṣṭhyaḥ pratīcī sā yāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1507: tā vā etāḥ / ekaviṃśatiriṣṭakā ime ca lokā diśaśceme ca vai lokā diśaśca pratiṣṭheme
GV03sb_08_u:1515: taddhaike / veṣaśrīḥ kṣatrāya kṣatraṃ jinveti triṃśattamīmupadadhati
GV03sb_08_u:1516: triṃśadakṣarā virāḍvirāḍeṣā citiriti na tathā kuryādati te
GV03sb_08_u:1518: virāḍindrāya ha ta indraloke dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam pratyudyāminaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1519: kurvantīndramindralokānnudante yajamāno vai sve yajña indro yajamānāya ha te
GV03sb_08_u:1520: yajamānaloke dviṣantam bhrātṛvyam pratyudyāminaṃ kurvanti yajamānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1521: yajamānalokānnudante yaṃ vā etamagnimāharantyeṣa eva yajamāna āyatanenaiṣa u
GV03sb_08_u:1525: vāgvā aṣāḍhā rasa eṣa vāci tadrasaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1529: iyaṃ vā aṣāḍhāsāvāditya stomabhāgā amuṃ tadādityamasyām
GV03sb_08_u:1533: iyaṃ vā aṣāḍhā hṛdayaṃ stomabhāgā asyāṃ taddhṛdayam mano
GV03sb_08_u:1534: dadhāti tasmādasyāṃ hṛdayena manasā cetayate sarvata upadadhāti
GV03sb_08_u:1535: sarvatastaddhṛdayam mano dadhāti tasmādasyāṃ sarvato hṛdayena manasā cetayate
GV03sb_08_u:1536: 'tho puṇyā haitā lakṣmyastā etatsarvato dhatte tasmādyasya sarvato lakṣma bhavati
GV03sb_08_u:1540: annaṃ vai purīṣaṃ rasa eṣa tametattiraḥ karoti
GV03sb_08_u:1544: annaṃ vai purīṣaṃ rasa eṣo 'nnaṃ ca tadrasaṃ ca saṃtanoti
GV03sb_08_u:1548: hṛdayaṃ vai stomabhāgāḥ purītatpurīṣaṃ hṛdayaṃ tatpurītatā
GV03sb_08_u:1553: tadyāścatasraḥ prathamāścitayaste catvāra ṛtavo 'tha stomabhāgā upadhāya purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1554: nivapati sā pañcamī citiḥ sa pañcama ṛtuḥ 8.5.4.[8]
GV03sb_08_u:1556: tadāhuḥ / yallokampṛṇāntā anyāścitayo bhavanti nātra lokampṛṇāmupadadhāti kātra
GV03sb_08_u:1557: lokampṛṇetyasau vā ādityo lokampṛṇaiṣa u eṣā citiḥ saiṣā svayaṃ lokampṛṇā citiratha
GV03sb_08_u:1558: yadata ūrdhvamā purīṣātsā ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ sa ṣaṣṭha ṛtuḥ 8.5.4.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:1562: prokṣatyagnimabhyādadhāti sā saptamī citiḥ sa saptama ṛtuḥ 8.5.4.[10]
GV03sb_08_u:1565: yaddhi vikarṇī ca svayamātṛṇā ca ṣaṣṭhyā eva tacciteḥ 8.5.4.[11]
GV03sb_08_u:1568: yajuṣānyāsu purīṣaṃ nivapati tūṣṇīmatra tenaiṣā na citiratho
GV03sb_08_u:1569: lokampṛṇāntā anyāścitayo bhavanti nātra lokanpṛṇāmupadhāti teno evaiṣā na citiḥ 8.5.4.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:1573: etāstisrastadantarikṣaṃ tadvā idamekamivaivāntarikṣaṃ tā evaṃ tisra evam pañcaivaṃ

GV03sb_08_u:1601: rājñyati prācī digiti rājñī ha nāmaiṣā prācī digvasavaste
GV03sb_08_u:1602: devā adhipataya iti vasavo haitasya diśo devā adhipatayo 'gnirhetīnām
GV03sb_08_u:1603: pratidhartetyagnirhaivātra haitīnām pratidhartā trivṛttvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatviti
GV03sb_08_u:1604: trivṛtā haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritājyamukthamavyathāyai stabhnātvityājyena
GV03sb_08_u:1605: haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā rathantaraṃ sāma pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti
GV03sb_08_u:1606: rathantareṇa haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā prathamajā deveṣviti prāṇā
GV03sb_08_u:1607: vā ṛṣayaḥ prathamajāstaddhi brahma prathamajaṃ divo mātrayā varimṇā prathantviti
GV03sb_08_u:1608: yāvatī dyaustāvatīṃ varimṇā prathantvityetadvidhartā cāyamadhipatiśceti vākca tau
GV03sb_08_u:1609: manaśca tau hīdaṃ sarvaṃ vidhārayataste tvā sarve saṃvidānā nākasya pṛṣṭhe svarge
GV03sb_08_u:1610: loke yajamānaṃ ca sādayantviti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ 8.6.1.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:1613: virāḍasi dakṣiṇā digiti virāḍḍha nāmaiṣā dakṣiṇā digrudrāste
GV03sb_08_u:1614: devā adhipataya iti rudrā haitasya diśo devā adhipataya indro hetīnām
GV03sb_08_u:1615: pratidhartetīndro haivātra hetīnām pratidhartā pañcadaśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1616: śrayatviti pañcadaśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā praugamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1617: stabhnātviti praugeṇa haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā bṛhatsāma
GV03sb_08_u:1618: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti bṛhatā haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1622: samrāḍasi pratīcī digiti samrāḍḍha nāmaiṣā pratīci digādityāste devā
GV03sb_08_u:1623: adhipataya ityādityā haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayo varuṇo hetīnām pratidharteti
GV03sb_08_u:1624: varuṇo haivātra hetīnām pratidhartā saptadaśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatviti
GV03sb_08_u:1625: saptadaśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā marutvatīyamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1626: stabhnātviti marutvatīyena haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā vairūpaṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:1627: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti vairūpeṇa haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1630: athottarataḥ svarāḍasyudīcī digiti svarāḍḍha nāmaiṣodīcī diṅmarutaste devā
GV03sb_08_u:1631: adhipataya iti maruto haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayaḥ somo hetīnām pratidharteti
GV03sb_08_u:1632: somo haivātra hetīnām pratidhartaikaviṃśastvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1633: śrayatvityekaviṃśena haiṣā stomena pṛthivyāṃ śritā niṣkevalyamukthamavyathāyai
GV03sb_08_u:1634: stabhnātviti niṣkevalyena haiṣokthenāvyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā vai rājaṃ sāma
GV03sb_08_u:1635: pratiṣṭhityā antarikṣa iti vairājena haiṣā sāmnā pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1639: adhipatnyasi bṛhatī digityadhipatnī ha nāmaiṣā bṛhatī digviśve te
GV03sb_08_u:1640: devā adhipataya iti viśve haitasyai diśo devā adhipatayo bṛhaspatirhetīnā
GV03sb_08_u:1641: pratidharteti bṛhaspatirhaivātra hetīnām pratidhartā triṇavatrayastriṃśau tvā stomau
GV03sb_08_u:1642: pṛthivyāṃ śrayatāmiti triṇavatrayastriṃśābhyāṃ haiṣā stomābhyām pṛthivyāṃ śritā
GV03sb_08_u:1644: haiṣokthābhyāmavyathāyai pṛthivyāṃ stabdhā śākvararaivate sāmanī pratiṣṭhityā
GV03sb_08_u:1645: antarikṣa iti śākvararaivatābhyāṃ haiṣā sāmabhyām pratiṣṭhitāntarikṣa ṛṣayastvā
GV03sb_08_u:1649: yajña u devānāmātmā yajñameva taddevā ātmānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1654: yajño vai nākasado yajña u eva pañcacūḍāstadya ime

GV03sb_08_u:1660: ardhamu haitadātmano yanmithunaṃ yadā vai saha mithunenātha sarvo 'tha kṛtsnaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1664: ātmā vai nākasadaḥ prajā pañcacūḍā atiriktaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1665: vai tadātmano yatprajā yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1669: diśo vai nākasado diśa u eva
GV03sb_08_u:1670: pañcacūḍāstadyā amuṣmādādityādarvācyaḥ pañca diśastā nākasado yāḥ parācyastāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1671: pañcacūḍā atiriktā vai tā diśo yā amuṣmādādityātparācyo yadu vā atiriktaṃ cūḍaḥ sa
GV03sb_08_u:1676: imāṃlokānupariṣṭādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etāneṣāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:1684: ayam puro harikeśa ityagnirvai purastadyattamāha pura iti
GV03sb_08_u:1685: prāñcaṃ hyagnimuddharanti prāñcamupacarantyatha yaddharikeśa ityāha haririva
GV03sb_08_u:1686: hyagniḥ sūryaraśmiriti sūryasyeva hyagne raśmayastasya rathagṛtsaśca rathaujāśca
GV03sb_08_u:1687: senānīgrāmaṇyāviti vāsantikau tāvṛtū puñjikasthalā ca kratusthalā cāpsarasāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1688: dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha māhitthiḥ senā ca tu te samitiśca daṅkṣṇavaḥ paśavo hetiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1689: pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ prahetiriti yadvai senāyāṃ ca samitau ca'rtīyante daṅkṣṇavaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1690: paśavo hetiḥ pauruṣeyo vadhaḥ prahetiriti yadanyo 'nyaṃ ghnanti sa pauruṣeyo
GV03sb_08_u:1691: vadhaḥ prahetistebhyo namo astviti tebhya eva namaskaroti teno mṛḍayantviti ta
GV03sb_08_u:1692: evāsmai mṛḍayanti te yaṃ dviṣmo yaśca no dveṣṭi tameṣāṃ jambhe dadhma iti
GV03sb_08_u:1693: yameva dveṣṭi yaścainaṃ dveṣṭi tameṣāṃ jambhe dadhātyamumeṣāṃ jambhe
GV03sb_08_u:1694: dadhāmīti ha brūyādyaṃ dviṣyāttato 'ha tasminna punarastyapi tannādriyeta
GV03sb_08_u:1698: ayaṃ dakṣiṇā viśvakarmetyayaṃ vai vāyurviśvakarmā yo 'yam
GV03sb_08_u:1699: pavata eṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ karoti tadyattamāha dakṣiṇeti tasmādeṣa dakṣiṇaiva
GV03sb_08_u:1700: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vāti tasya rathasvanaśca rathecitraśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti graiṣmau
GV03sb_08_u:1701: tāvṛtū menakā ca sahajanyā cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha māhitthirime tu
GV03sb_08_u:1702: te dyāvāpṛthivī yātudhānā hetī rakṣāṃsi prahetiriti yātudhānā haivātra hetī rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_08_u:1706: ayam paścādviśvavyacā ityasau vā ādityo viśvavyacā yadā hyevaiṣa
GV03sb_08_u:1707: udetyathedaṃ sarvaṃ vyaco bhavati tadyattamāha paścāditi tasmādetam
GV03sb_08_u:1708: pratyañcameva yantam paśyanti tasya rathaprotaścāsamarathaśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti
GV03sb_08_u:1709: vārṣikau tāvṛtū pramlocantī cānumlocantī cāpsarasāviti dikcopadiśā ceti ha smāha
GV03sb_08_u:1710: māhitthirahorātre tu te te hi pra ca mlocato 'nu ca mlocato vyāghrā hetiḥ sarpāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:1711: prahetiriti vyāghrā haivātra hetiḥ sarpāḥ prahetistebhyo namo astvititasyokto bandhuḥ 8.6.1.[19]
GV03sb_08_u:1716: yajñaṃ hi saṃyantītīdaṃ vasviti tasya tārkṣyaścāriṣṭanemiśca senānīgrāmaṇyāviti

GV03sb_08_u:2191: parāsyennedanārtamātmano bahirdhā karavāṇīti dhiṣṇyebhyaḥ pratisaṃkhyāya yā
GV03sb_08_u:2193: utkiredutkaro vā atiriktasya pratiṣṭhā tadyatrātiriktasya pratiṣṭhā tadevainā
GV03sb_08_u:2198: cityorupadadhyātpratiṣṭhā vai pādo yo vai pādaḥ sa hasta ūrvasthamātryo varṣiṣṭhāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:2199: syurna hyūrvasthātkiṃ cana varṣīyo 'sthyasti tryālikhitavatyastisraścitayaḥ syustrivṛto
GV03sb_08_u:2200: hīme lokā aparimitālikhite dve raso haite citī aparimita u vai rasaḥ sarvāstveva
GV03sb_08_u:2205: madhyamāyāṃ citā upadadhyādantarikṣaṃ vai madhyamā citirantarikṣamu vai
GV03sb_08_u:2206: sarveṣām bhūtānāmāvapanamatho annaṃ vai yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā udaram madhyamā
GV03sb_08_u:2209: tadāhuḥ / nopadadhyānnedatirecayānīti sa vā upaiva dadhyātkāmebhyo vā etā iṣṭakā
GV03sb_08_u:2210: upadhīyante na vai kāmānāmatiriktamasti sa vai naivopadadhyādetāvadvā etaddevā
GV03sb_08_u:2218: prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇānnam purīṣam prāṇe tadannaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2219: dadhāti tena sarvamātmānam pracādayati tammādyatprāṇe 'nnaṃ dhīyate
GV03sb_08_u:2225: sa vā aiva vapedannena vai prāṇā viṣṭabdhā yo vā annaṃ nātti saṃ vai tasya prāṇā
GV03sb_08_u:2226: rohanti tadyasya ha tathā kurvanti yathā śuṣkā sūrmī suṣiraivaṃ ha so
GV03sb_08_u:2240: hāsya tadaṅgaṃ nābhiprāpnuyādyadu vai prāṇo 'ṅgaṃ nābhiprāpnoti śuṣyati vā vai
GV03sb_08_u:2244: indraṃ hi sarvāṇi bhūtāni vardhayanti samudravyacasaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2245: gira iti mahimānamasyaitadāha rathītamaṃ rathīnāmiti rathitamo hyeṣa rathināṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2246: vājānāṃ satpatim patimityannaṃ vai vājā annānāṃ satpatim
GV03sb_08_u:2253: vāgvā anuṣṭubvāgu sarvāṇi candāṃsi teno evārdham 8.7.3.[9]
GV03sb_08_u:2257: svayamātṛṇā vāyuṃ ca taddivaṃ copadadhātyuttame upadadhātyuttame hi vāyuśca
GV03sb_08_u:2258: dyauśca saṃspṛṣṭe saṃspṛṣṭe hi vāyuśca dyauśca pūrvāṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2259: vikarṇīmupadadhātyarvācīnaṃ taddivo vāyuṃ dadhāti tasmādeṣo 'rvācīnameva vātaḥ
GV03sb_08_u:2264: imāṃlokāntsūtre samāvayate tadyattatsūtraṃ vāyuḥ sa sa yaḥ sa vāyureṣā sā vikarṇī
GV03sb_08_u:2269: svayamātṛṇāyuśca tatprāṇaṃ copadadhātyuttame upadadhātyuttame hyāyuśca prāṇaśca
GV03sb_08_u:2270: saṃspṛṣṭe saṃspṛṣṭe hyāyuśca prāṇaśca pūrvāmuttarāṃ vikarṇīmupadadhātyāyuṣā
GV03sb_08_u:2275: śociradha sma te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇamastīti yadā vā etasya vāto 'nuvāti śocirathaitasya
GV03sb_08_u:2276: vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇam bhavati triṣṭubhopadadhāti traiṣṭubho hi vāyurāgneyyāgnikarma
GV03sb_08_u:2277: hyaniruktayānirukto hi vāyuratha yadvāta ityāha vāto hi vāyuḥ 8.7.3.[13]
GV03sb_08_u:2281: āyustasyaitatsadanamavata ityeṣa hīdaṃ sarvamavati cāyāyāmityetasya hīdaṃ sarvaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2282: cāyāyāṃ samudrasyahyetaddhṛdayaṃ raśmīvatīm bhāsvatīmiti raśmīvatī hi
GV03sb_08_u:2283: dyaurbhāsvatyā yā dyām bhāsyā pṛthivīmorvantarikṣamityevaṃ hyeṣa
GV03sb_08_u:2294: upa mehi ma etaddhehi yena me tvamudakramīriti kim me tato
GV03sb_08_u:2295: bhaviṣyatīti tvaddevatyameva ma etadātmano bhaviṣyatīti tatheti
GV03sb_08_u:2304: vyacasvatprathastaddivaṃ yaca divaṃ dṛṃha divam mā hiṃsīrityātmānaṃ yacātmānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2308: vyānāyodānāyeti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā sarvasmā u vā
GV03sb_08_u:2309: etasmai prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāyetīme vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā ima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_08_u:2311: mahatyā svastyetyetaccardiṣā śaṃtameneti yaccardiḥ śaṃtamaṃ tenetyetat 8.7.3.[20]
GV03sb_08_u:2314: nānā hi vāyuśca dyauśca sakṛtsādayati samānaṃ tatkaroti samānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2315: hyāyuśca prāṇaśca te vā ubhe eva śarkare bhavata ubhe svayamātṛṇe samānaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2316: hyevāyuśca prāṇaścāthaine sūdadohasādhivadati prāṇo vai sūdadohāḥ prāṇeṇaivaine
GV03sb_08_u:2320: āpo vai sūdo 'nnaṃ dohaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnaya ityannaṃ vai
GV03sb_08_u:2321: pṛśni janmandevānāmiti saṃvatsaro vai devānāṃ janma viśa iti yajño vai viśo yajñe hi
GV03sb_08_u:2322: sarvāṇi bhūtāni viṣṭāni triṣvā rocane diva iti savanāni vai trīṇi rocanāni
GV03sb_08_u:2323: savanānyetadāhānuṣṭubhā vāgvā anuṣṭubvāgu sarve prāṇā vācā caivaine etatprāṇena
GV03sb_08_u:2324: ca saṃtanoti saṃdadhāti sā vā eṣaikā satī sūdadohāḥ sarvā iṣṭakā anusaṃcarati prāṇo
GV03sb_08_u:2329: ime vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇāstā etāḥ śarkarāstā devā
GV03sb_08_u:2333: te 'bruvan / upa tajjānīta yathaiṣu lokeṣu ramasupajīvanaṃ dadhāmeti te
GV03sb_08_u:2343: ime vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā eṣvevaitallokeṣu rasamupajīvanaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2347: etāsu vyāhṛtiṣu gāyati bhūriti vā ayaṃ loko bhuva
GV03sb_08_u:2348: ityantarikṣalokaḥ svarityasau loka eṣvevaitallokeṣu rasamupajīvanaṃ dadhāti 8.7.4.[6]
GV03sb_08_u:2352: hyapaśyannatha yatsamānanidhanānyekā hyeva yajñasya pratiṣṭhaikaṃ nidhanaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2362: tanūm madhyato dadhāti rukbhaṃ ca puruṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2368: pañca kṛtvaḥ pañcacitiko 'gniḥ pañca 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_08_u:2370: sahasreṇa sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarveṇaivāsminnetadamṛtaṃ rūpamuttamaṃ dadhāti 8.7.4.[10]
GV03sb_08_u:2374: parītya dakṣiṇata udaṅ tiṣṭhaṃstaddakṣiṇāvṛttaddhi devatrāthānuparītya paścātprāṅ
GV03sb_08_u:2378: sahasrasya pratimāsi sahasrasyonmāsi sāhasro 'si sahasrāya tveti
GV03sb_08_u:2379: sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarvamasi sarvasmai tvetyetat 8.7.4.[12]
GV03sb_08_u:2382: ayameva lokaḥ prathamā citiḥ paśavaḥ purīṣaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2383: yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatīmaṃ tallokam paśubhiḥ pracādayati 8.7.4.[13]
GV03sb_08_u:2390: nakṣatrāṇi purīṣaṃ yattṛtīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:2394: dakṣiṇāḥ purīṣaṃ yaccaturthī citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:2398: prajā purīṣaṃ yatpañcamīṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayati
GV03sb_08_u:2405: amṛtameva saptamī citiḥ tāmuttamāmupadadhātyamṛtaṃ tadasya sarvasyottamaṃ
GV03sb_08_u:2406: dadhāti tasmādasya sarvasyāmṛtamuttamaṃ tasmāddevā anantarhitāstasmādu te 'mṛtā
GV03sb_08_u:2411: purīṣaṃ yatprathamāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetasya tadātmano māṃsaiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:2419: yaddvitīyāṃ citim purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetadasya tadātmano māṃsaiḥ
GV03sb_08_u:2420: saṃcādayatīṣṭakā upadhāyāsthīṣṭakā asthi tanmāṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati purīṣa
GV03sb_08_u:2421: upadadhāti purīṣeṇa pracādayatyetadasya tadātmana ubhayato māṃsaiḥ saṃcādayati
GV03sb_08_u:2426: citirgrīvā eva pañcamī citiḥ śira eva ṣaṣṭhī citiḥ prāṇā eva saptamī
GV03sb_08_u:2428: sarvasya prāṇā uttamāḥ purīṣa upadadhāti māṃsaṃ vai purīṣam māṃsena
